task.title: Close all of your programs
task.shortdesc: You need to shut down everything else before installing major programs

step.cmd: If you are on a Windows system, click the X in the corner of each program.
If you are on a Linux system, type kill -9 [PID] for each of your programs.
step.tutorialinfo: You might want to save your data first.

step.cmd: If you are on a Macintosh, you will have to ask someone else. I have a wonderful little iPod, but that is the limit of my experience with Apple products.
